OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD AND DISTRICT AMATEUR SWIMMING ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Local governing body for the South Yorkshire area. Officiates at local, district, national, international, special needs, Sheffield schools, English schools and Disabled Sport England competitions. Holds a one day Gala at the beginning of the year and the South Yorkshire Masters at the end of the year.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Last Wed in alternate months at 7.30pm (except March)
